page.title: 14A MUSLIM'S HOLY DAY
page.content: We wake up at sunrise on our Festival Day.We go into the bathroom and have a bath,clean our teeth,then get dressed. Next we go down into the kitchen to make our breakfast.When we have finished eating we put our special praying caps on and go to the Y.M.C.A. Sports Centre to pray Namaz.After we have prayed,we put on our best clothes,then visit people's homes to eat.At 3.00 we go to the mosque to pray Namaz.After we have prayed,the young people go to their local town centre to spend the money which they have been given on this holy day.At 6.00pm we return to the mosque to pray.On this special day we have a supper in the mosque after which we go home to go to sleep.During this time some of the important men of the mosque(the elders)remain praying till the next Namaz at 10.00pm.
